name: Scott Reimers
text: I live the white stripe pizza. Staff was friendly and helpful. I just wish they had a bench or a few tables and chairs so I could eat my pizza there.

text: Blaze came to Arcadia! Love their hot and fresh pizzasüçïGreat addition to an array of restaurants nearby. How it works is the same as other Blaze location, choose from their signature pizzas or you can pick by yourself.

name: leo M.
text: The people thar work here are super friendly and helpful. Funny too

text: The food and beverage is fine. but while I was sitting there enjoying my lunch one of the workers came to my table and asked me if I had paid for it. I offered him to check his receipts against my credit card since I didn't ask for a ‚Ä¶More

text: Everyone working here is amazing! I have a fairly severe allergy to gluten, and was able to rest here without getting sick. The staff was extremely careful about cross contamination and amazing dealing with my multitude of questions. I ‚Ä¶More

name: a ad
text: You won't feel respected as a customer here, it's more like looking for a job. No smiles, no greetings, no waiting for explanations. I believe I will not make such mistakes again

name: Bekah Michelle
text: Thanks to the coupon received in the mail, my son and I got buy one get one free!!! I wanted to try the cauliflower crust but they were sold out!!! So asked asked about the keto crust and they said they sold out!!! Sunday night at 6pm!! But overall good experience. I love the balsamic glaze!!
